I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "important advance" (this is a general term that refers to the overall significance of the development, rather than a specific material name)
* "PSCs" (this is an abbreviation for "photovoltaic cells", which is a broader term that encompasses multiple types of solar cells, rather than a specific material name)
